title: Web Developer
description: Used provided Figma designs to develop interactive web experiences
Modeled data for MVC implementation with Kentico CMS

title: Software Engineer II
description: Developed and enhanced the front-end of a UUV simulator/controller system
Collaborated closely with the team, leading walkthroughs to ensure seamless integration of simulator hardware and software components
Conducted testing to ensure software met user specifications and requirements

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Led the design and development of a UI/UX for a proprietary image/sonar data annotation tool, utilizing Electron, React, and Typescript
Presented regular updates in team meetings and collaborated on potential improvements for tool iterations

title: UI/UX App Design Lead / PM / Developer
description: Developed interactive data visualizations using JavaScript, React, and Node, focusing on product battery data
Spearheaded the transition of the internal design workflow to incorporate GitHub for design asset version control

title: Project Manager
description: Developed and managed project plans, working with team leads and project team to execute on plans
Managed schedules, budgets, assets, and overall project organization and deliverable dates
Effectively and efficiently planned and prioritized all deliverables and resources working across projects based on scope of work and project goals
Communicated and documented project statuses and strategic recommendations to clients and team members on a regular basis
Identified and administered process improvements

title: Sr. Digital Production Project Manager
description: Managed the production of digital products from conception through product release. Project lead for 50 - 60 major digital educational technology products per year, spanning 2-6 months in production per project

Managed a team of 4 Media Project Managers. Resource manager for team, ensuring tasks were manageable. Worked with other departments as necessary in order to help them with project management of projects outside of my team, including vendors

Planned projects and managed schedules. Ran master planning and scheduling meetings, weekly status meetings and daily stand-up/scrum meetings for stakeholders. Updated project documents. Served as point of contact between departments
Wrote statements of work (SOW), approved vendor invoices and updated project documents

title: Media Producer
description: Managed the production of high-profile digital web projects. Liaison between stakeholder and internal vendors from product launch through final release
Monitored digital product delivery and presented in status meetings
Managed vendors and organized digital media asset creation
Ensured quality of final product. Worked closely with overseas Quality Assurance team responsible for identifying product defects. Helped to resolve software defects
